name: Construct 2 Ray Casting tech Demo: Mummy Temple
name_original: Construct 2 Ray Casting tech Demo: Mummy Temple
description:
This is a tech demo of some of what can be done using the uberdroidgames Construct2 Ray Casting template.  The template comes with all the source code for this and other examples along with a document and several videos that tell how the template works.  

Make  your own FPS (or other kinds) ray-casting games in Construct 2 with no 3d plugins. 

FPS controls:
ASDW to move

Mouse to aim and fire

UBERDROIDGAMES Construct 2 Ray Casting Game Kit will be available at the Scirra.com store and other software download only stores when it is released.
